/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, creating a serene backdrop for the bustling city below. The buildings in the background are tall and modern, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight, showcasing the blend of traditional and modern architecture that characterizes Beijing. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of the scene.
